name: mrpostman
description:
"Mr. Postman" is an Arcade-Old School game, where the player takes the role of a postman, working at the mountain town of Skystead. To succeed, he’ll need to master usage of the only mean of transportation, a hot air balloon, and keep all the customers satisfied, by delivering their packages on time. Dogs, birds, winds, and drones are all joining in the fun in a unique and exhilarating experience.

The game was Developed as part of the video game design program at Shenkar.
